Let’s get started.
1.1 Time Series Forecasting
Time series forecasting is diﬃcult. Unlike the simpler problems of classiﬁcation and regression,
time series problems add the complexity of order or temporal dependence between observations.
This can be diﬃcult as specialized handling of the data is required when ﬁtting and evaluating
models. This temporal structure can also aid in modeling, providing additional structure like
